name: Cloud tycoon
description:
CLOUD TYCOON

Simple design, with even simpler game play, just get your lazy fingers and start clicking! 

By clicking on the cloud, you start making money, there's completly no limit to how far you can go, as long as you want, you can.

Don't worry about loosing progress, the game saves all your data, so if you left, once you come back again, you'll start from  exactly where you left!
